meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joyce Yuan Keith Williams Lee Tucker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4413.

div.div:
2003 College Championship quarterfinal game 3.
From Yale University.

td.p: Joyce Yuan, a freshman at UC Berkeley from San Francisco, California
Keith Williams, a freshman at Middlebury College from Manchester, Vermont
Lee Tucker, a sophomore at Carleton College from Lansing, New York

tr.td: LIBRARIES
NEW VIDEO GAMES
WORLD CAPITALS
WEEDER'S DIGEST
THEY ATTENDED YALE
IDIOMS

Jefferson Davis

KeithJoyce
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
